document_data.caption: A well-placed tortoise shell.
document_data.name: Tortoise Shell
document_data.Effects: This spell created a large protective turtle shell measuring {{SI|5|ft|long=yes}} in diameter. The shell was quite durable and could even float if turned upside down. The shell could be moved about by the caster as if it only weighed a few pounds, but it was much heavier if anyone else tried to move it. The shell would remain perfectly balanced if set perpendicular to the ground.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a whole turtle shell to cast.
